Briefly, total RNA was extracted from tongue tissue of the mice. cDNA library was constructed using VAHTS Universal V6 RNA-seq Library Prep Kit for Illumina® (Vazyme, USA) and then sequenced with Illumina NovaSeq6000. After paraffin embedding, the tongue tissues were cut into 5 μm sections and stained with hematoxylin and eosin (H&E), Ki−67 (1:200, ab16667, Abcam) or γH2A.X (1:200, ab81299, Abcam). Images were taken using a fluorescence microscope (Olympus Co.). Patients The specimens and clinical information were obtained from the CHC patients in Department of Oral Medicine of Peking University School and Hospital of Stomatology. The diagnostic criteria of CHC refer to the previous studies [ 19 Whole exome sequencing The diseased CHC tissues (or mouse tissues) were rinsed with PBS and lysed in DNA extract buffer to extract the genomic DNA. Whole exome sequencing (WES) was performed by Novogene Bioinformatics Technology Co., Ltd (Beijing, China). Briefly, genomic DNA was fragmented into an average size of 180 to 280 bp and subjected to DNA library construction. The Illumina HiSeq PE150 platform (Illumina Inc., San Diego, CA, USA) was utilized for genomic DNA sequencing. As for the mouse tissues, the matched lamina propria tissue samples were utilized to generate the reference background used for somatic mutation calling. Then the somatic mutations in epithelium tissue were identified. The Leuk-1 cells were co-cultured with C. albicans Immunofluorescence The cells were fixed with 4% paraformaldehyde for 30 min, and then treated with 1% Triton X−100 for 10 min. After blocked with 2% BSA, the cells were stained with γH2A.X (1:200, ab81299, Abcam). Brightfield and fluorescent images were taken using a fluorescence microscope (Olympus Co.). Western blotting Total proteins in cells were extracted by radioimmunoprecipitation buffer (RIPA lysis buffer, Thermo Fisher Scientific). The Western blotting experiment was performed according to the standard procedures. Primary antibody against γH2A.X (ab81299, Abcam) was used at a 1:1,000 dilution. Quantitative real-time PCR Total RNA was extracted and reverse-transcribed into cDNA with ABScript III Reverse Transcriptase (Abclonal). Amplification was performed in triplicate using Universal SYBR green Fast qPCR Mix (Abclonal).
